extensions.title: Darwin Core Occurrence
extensions.description: The category of information pertaining to evidence of an occurrence in nature, in a collection, or in a dataset (specimen, observation, etc.). Updated Nov 2011 with newly ratified terms.

extensions.title: Darwin Core Taxon
extensions.description: The category of information pertaining to taxonomic names, taxon name usages, or taxon concepts. Updated Nov 20011 with newly ratified terms.

extensions.title: Germplasm (0.1)
extensions.description: Development of the Darwin Core Germplasm Extension was started during the Darwin Core workshop in January 2009 (in Copenhagen). This Germplasm Extension is modelled directly from the Multi-Crop Passport standard and the (proposed) EPGRIS3 trait data standard for characterisation and evaluation data (C&E). The purpose of building this germplasm extension for Darwin Core is for the development of an application schema for the GBIF IPT data publishing toolkit. The DwC Germplasm extension could also stimulate a process of further improved compatibility of the terms for documentation of germplasm and the terms and concepts used for documentation in other sub-domains of biodiversity informatics.
extensions.subject: dwc:Occurrence

extensions.title: Darwin Core Measurement Or Facts
extensions.description: Support for generic measurements or facts as defined in Darwin Core.
extensions.subject: dwc:Occurrence dwc:Taxon

extensions.title: Darwin Core Identification History
extensions.description: Support for multiple identification/determinations of species occurrences such as specimens. All identifications including the current one should be listed, while the current should also be repeated in the occurrence core for simple access.
extensions.subject: dwc:Occurrence

extensions.title: Darwin Core Resource Relationship
extensions.description: Support for generic resource rleations according to Darwin Core terms.
extensions.subject: dwc:Occurrence dwc:Taxon

extensions.title: Trait measurement experiment (v20120911)
extensions.description: The Darwin Core extension for genebanks (DwC germplasm) was developed in 2009 for sharing genebank datasets with the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). This application schema includes the terms to describe the experiments to collect trait measurements or so-called Characterization and Evaluation (C and E) data. These terms where largely developed by the EPGRIS3 group of the European Coopertive Programme for Plant Genetic Resources (ECPGR) in 2009.

extensions.title: Trait measurement or fact (v20120911)
extensions.description: The Darwin Core extension for genebanks (DwC germplasm) was developed in 2009 for sharing genebank datasets with the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). This application schema includes the terms to describe the trait measurements or so-called Characterization and Evaluation (C and E) data. These terms where developed by the EPGRIS3 group of the European Coopertive Programme for Plant Genetic Resources (ECPGR) in 2009. Most of the terms here are already covered by Darwin Core

extensions.title: Germplasm accession (v20120911)
extensions.description: The Darwin Core extension for genebanks (DwC-germplasm) was developed in 2009 for sharing genebank datasets with the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). The GBIF IPT use the Darwin Core as the data standard in the core of a star schema with the germplasm extension and other extensions adding data properties from other standards. The DwC germaplasm provides some of the fundamental terms from the plant genetic resouces community for food and agriculture (PGRFA). Most of these terms are imported from the Multi-Crop Passport Descriptor List (MCPD) maintained by Bioversity International and the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO). Some few additional terms were developed by the European Coopertive Programme for Plant Genetic Resources (ECPGR). See also: http://code.google.com/p/darwincore-germplasm/

extensions.title: Trait measurement method (v20120911)
extensions.description: The Darwin Core extension for genebanks (DwC germplasm) was developed in 2009 for sharing genebank datasets with the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). This application schema includes the terms to describe the descriptors used for trait measurements or so-called Characterization and Evaluation (C and E) data. These terms where developed by the EPGRIS3 group of the European Coopertive Programme for Plant Genetic Resources (ECPGR) in 2009.

extensions.title: Types and Specimen
extensions.description: An extension for specimens and types, including type specimens, type species and type genera and simple specimens unrelated to types.
extensions.subject: dwc:Taxon

extensions.title: Vernacular Names
extensions.description: Extension to core taxa that lists vernacular names for a scientific taxon
extensions.subject: dwc:Taxon

extensions.title: Species Profile
extensions.description: A basic species profile with characteristics in addition to textural description which are covered by the description extension.
extensions.subject: dwc:Taxon

extensions.title: Literature References
extensions.description: Bibliography, i.e. list of literature references. For example a taxon or occurrence/specimen.
extensions.subject: dwc:Taxon dwc:Occurrence

extensions.title: Taxon Description
extensions.description: DwC Taxon extension to exchange simple text/paragraph based taxon descriptions. Not suitable for structured descriptions and keys, but useful for creating species pages.
extensions.subject: dwc:Taxon checklist

extensions.title: Simple Images
extensions.description: Simple extension for exchanging metadata, in particular links, for species or occurrence images
extensions.subject: dwc:Taxon dwc:Occurrence
